entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 10:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight then becoming north 30 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
